scripts.check-types-all: cd backendV2 && npx tsc --noEmit && cd ../frontend && npm run build > /dev/null 2>&1 && cd ../shared && npx tsc --noEmit && cd ../public-tests && npx tsc --noEmit
scripts.lint-all: cd backendV2 && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint && cd ../shared && npm run lint && cd ../public-tests && npm run lint
scripts.build-all: cd backendV2 && npx tsc && cd ../frontend && npm run build && cd ../shared && npx tsc && cd ../public-tests && npm run build
scripts.check-no-any: grep -r ': any\|any\[\]\|any>' --include='*.ts' --include='*.tsx' --exclude-dir=node_modules --exclude-dir=.next --exclude-dir=dist --exclude-dir=build . | grep -v '//.*any\|\.d\.ts:' || echo '✅ No any types found'
scripts.check-no-unknown: grep -r ': unknown\|unknown\[\]\|unknown>' --include='*.ts' --include='*.tsx' --exclude-dir=node_modules --exclude-dir=.next --exclude-dir=dist --exclude-dir=build . | grep -v 'isValidUser\|parseJwt\|//.*unknown\|\.d\.ts:' || echo '✅ No unknown types found'
